Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos.
